   contain the root `toctree` directive.

NC-Opt User Guide
=================

`NC-Opt
<https://github.com/wwkong/nc_opt>`_ is a library of algorithms and frameworks for Nonconvex Composite Optimization problems written in MATLAB. Currently, the following general problems classes are supported:

	- **Unconstrained Composite Optimization**
	- **Linearly-Set Contrained Optimization**

Any feedback, suggestions, and/or bug reports are welcome.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
